TopicTitle: A guide to modeling, texturing and part editing.

Articles.Content:
Hello KSP moders.

I would like your help.

I need a guide on how to make parts for KSP from designing the part to texturing it eventually to making it appear in game.

Now i can make changes to a parts cfg file but thats about as far as i go into modding.

it would help if the tutorial is up to date and easy to understand.

For a start id like to make a few simple fuel tanks then onto structural peices.

thanks in advance.
Well this is a relatively slow response time.
What's wrong with the huge sticky in Add-on Development?

> 
> What do you mean.

Maybe have a look here [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE)
Is there no simple step by step instruction manual of how to make the model, texture it, edit cfg. for it and get it ingame, just a basic cylinder.

> 
> Is there no simple step by step instruction manual of how to make the model, texture it, edit cfg. for it and get it ingame, just a basic cylinder.

yes there is, in the thread linked above.
